environmentTemplateJSON.companyphilosophy: The Seasonal Driver Helper is an ideal role for many people. It’s perfect for college students who return home (or remain on campus) during winter break. It’s a great opportunity for a stay-at-home parent looking for serious cash as the holiday season approaches. Above all, this is one of the roles where someone who’s serious about their future can make their mark with UPS, regardless of where you are in life. Sure, it requires some heavy lifting (up to 35 lbs.), but who isn’t looking for a healthy job these days? Most significantly, the Seasonal Driver Helper will be delivering merriment and cheer throughout the holiday season to the residents of the communities in which they live! This is a vital role in UPS seasonal operations that offers long-term career advancement with a Fortune 50 Employer. No drivers’ license is required – only reliable transportation – and the dedicated Seasonal Driver Helper will by picked up by the Package Delivery Driver on a local route.

coverletterTemplateJSON.body:
Dear {{audience.attn}},

My name is {{user.firstName}} {{user.middleName}} {{user.lastName}}. I discovered {{audience.situation}}, at {{audience.name}}, and I want to contribute to your work. I consider myself skilled in {{desirability.skillarray}}. As a {{desirability.applicationidentity}}, {{desirability.abilityarray}}. I derive a personal satisfaction and pride when I fulfill the goals and expectations of {{desirability.knowledgearray}}. I am seeking to diversify my experience portfolio and further my way of life as a {{desirability.applicationidentity}}.

{{audience.attn}}, thank you for doing what you do, and thank you for taking the time to read how {{audience.name}} has inspired my own work.
